statements: SELECT id, name, quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE source_type = 'organic' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, unit, quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE unit = 'kg';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE source_type = 'Kitchen Waste' AND location IS NULL;
SELECT name, quantity, unit FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, source_type, location FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE source_type = 'Yard Waste' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM households;
SELECT house_id, waste_weight FROM households WHERE waste_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM businesses ORDER BY business_id DESC;
SELECT SUM(waste_weight) AS total_waste FROM households;
SELECT house_id, waste_weight FROM households UNION SELECT business_id, waste_weight FROM businesses;
SELECT * FROM households WHERE waste_weight > 100 ORDER BY house_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(waste_weight) AS avg_weight FROM businesses;
SELECT house_id, waste_weight FROM households UNION SELECT business_id, waste_weight FROM businesses;
SELECT * FROM businesses WHERE waste_weight < 50 ORDER BY business_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT house_id) AS total_households FROM households;
SELECT * FROM households_waste;
SELECT id, address FROM households_waste WHERE quantity_kg > 100;
SELECT business_name, collection_date FROM businesses_waste ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity_kg) AS total_household_waste FROM households_waste;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM households_waste WHERE quantity_kg > 100 ORDER BY address DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT quantity_kg, address, collection_date FROM households_waste WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY collection_date ASC
SELECT SUM(quantity_kg) AS total_waste FROM businesses_waste
SELECT AVG(quantity_kg) AS avg_waste, YEAR(collection_date) AS year FROM households_waste GROUP BY year HAVING avg_waste > 50
SELECT b.business_name, e.total_waste_kg FROM businesses_waste b JOIN environmental_impact e ON b.id = e.id WHERE e.assessment_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM households_waste
SELECT location, quantity FROM businesses_waste ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT waste_type, quantity FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date = '2021-10-15'
SELECT * FROM collection_points WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT location, waste_type, quantity FROM households_waste JOIN businesses_waste ON households_waste.location = businesses_waste.location
SELECT id, location, waste_type, quantity FROM households_waste WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM businesses_waste WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, collection_date, collector_id, waste_type, quantity FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type='Recyclable' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_points WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, waste_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM households_waste GROUP BY location, waste_type ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM households;
SELECT name, address FROM households WHERE waste_generated > 5;
SELECT industry, waste_generated FROM businesses ORDER BY waste_generated DESC;
SELECT impact_type, impact_rating FROM environmental_impact WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_site LIKE '%landfill%';
SELECT * FROM households WHERE waste_generated > 100
SELECT name, address FROM households ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT b.name, w.collection_date FROM businesses AS b JOIN waste_collection AS w ON b.id = w.source_id
SELECT i.impact_type, i.impact_rating, b.name FROM environmental_impact AS i JOIN businesses AS b ON i.source_id = b.id WHERE i.impact_rating > 3 ORDER BY i.impact_rating DESC
SELECT d.disposal_date, d.weight_disposed, d.disposal_site, h.name FROM waste_disposal AS d JOIN households AS h ON d.id = h.id ORDER BY d.disposal_date ASC
